content.raw:
I still see some instances of this repo's URL:

Issues in comments, which can be changed later:

```
./jenkins-scripts/lib/boilerplate_prepare.sh:# #!/osrf/release-tools/issue/22
./jenkins-scripts/docker/lib/generic-abi-base.bash:# Bug in gcc5 with eigen see: #!/osrf/release-tools/issues/147
./jenkins-scripts/dsl/_configs_/OSRFLinuxCompilation.groovy:      // #!/osrf/release-tools/issues/75"
./jenkins-scripts/dsl/_configs_/OSRFLinuxCompilation.groovy:             echo "check: #!/osrf/release-tools/issues/75"
./jenkins-scripts/dsl/gazebo.dsl:        // See: #!/osrf/release-tools/issues/129
```

Trivial message that should be changed:

```
./one-line-installations/gazebo.sh:	installer script (yet - PRs welcome! [#!/osrf/release-tools])
```

Code that needs migration?

```
./jenkins-scripts/cygwin/dsl/roscywgin_compilation.dsl:        hg('http://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools','${RTOOLS_BRANCH}')
./jenkins-scripts/gazebo-one_liner-homebrew.bash:curl -ssL #!/osrf/release-tools/raw/default/one-line-installations/gazebo.sh | sh -x
./manual-jenkins-script-launcher/docker/prepare_env.sh:       hg clone http://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools ${WORKSPACE}/scripts 
./manual-jenkins-script-launcher/prepare_env.sh:       hg clone http://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools ${WORKSPACE}/scripts 
```
